title: Manage product modules
content:
This page explains product modules and lists the topics related to managing product modules.

Product module

A product module is a subset of a product model. It can represent a specific set of features or a specific subcomponent of the product. Product modules help break a product into manageable components, making it easier to classify and route requests effectively during request handling.

Topics related to managing product modules

  • Product module workflow
  • Add product module
  • View or edit product module
  • Delete product module
